# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $10000 to you, and I am extending this chance to purchase it directly from me. Considering its rarity and significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment to the product. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this exceptional offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
